article_title: Seattle Teacher Strike A Great Opportunity To Solve Longstanding Problem

article_metadata.description: Even in a state where 20 of the 50 most expensive hospitals reside, it's been shown that it's possible to have fair pay, a fantastic benefits package, and spend 50% less on benefits than the average employer.
